sentences.en: It has long been fashionable for Silicon Valley visionaries to prognosticate about the direction of technology.
sentences.cn: 硅谷的想象者预测了技术的发展方向流行了好长时间。

sentences.en: It is the most important matter to influence the stability and prognosticate of surgery.
sentences.cn: 术后角膜愈合反应是影响手术稳定性及预测性的重要原因之一.

sentences.en: Or else of thee this I prognosticate, Thy end is truth's and Beauty's doom and date.
sentences.cn: 要不然关于你我将这样昭示:你的末日也就是真和美的死.

sentences.en: Secondly , an algorithm of replication placement policy is proposed depending on prognosticate mechanism.
sentences.cn: 提出了动态阈值预测机制的副本自适应放置算法, 以提高系统吞吐量.

sentences.en: Such a whistle stop tour does not remotely qualify me to prognosticate on China's grander questions.
sentences.cn: 这样走马观花的游历,根本不足以让我就中国那些宏大的问题发表预测.

sentences.en: Such a whistlestop tour does not remotely qualify me to prognosticate on China's grander questions.
sentences.cn: 这样走马观花的游历，根本不足以让我就中国那些宏大的问题发表预测。

sentences.en: The coma duration prognostication model can prognosticate the duration of coma.
sentences.cn: 结论：昏迷时间预测模型可为临床提供昏迷时间预测。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, I am not able to prognosticate how everything will eventually shake out.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，我无法预言每件事的最终结果将会怎样。

trans.tran_en: to foretell (future events) according to present signs or indications; prophesy
